wikitext.*:
"'''Free Land'''" was the political designation of [[the Shire]] from {{FoA|6}} ({{SR|1427}}).<ref name="App-Later">{{App|Later}}</ref>

Following the re-establishment of [[Arnor]] by King [[Aragorn|Elessar]] in {{TA|3019}},<ref name="RK-Field">{{RK|Cormallen}}</ref> the King declared that the Shire was to become a Free Land under the protection of the [[Sceptre of Annúminas|Northern Sceptre]]. Furthermore, he declared that no [[Men]] are to enter the Shire - a policy he even upheld himself.<ref name="App-Later" />
